title: End The Pod Wars with Jason Stewart
description:
Armistice! Peace! The great war has ended! Our long national nightmare is officially over. This week, The Only Podcast That Matters™ is extending the olive branch to How Long Gone cohost and emissary Jason “Them Jeans” Stewart. The boys are dialing in one of America’s tallest podcasters for a good, old fashioned grilling, extra charred, covering all the courses: the most important truce of our times, pandemic profiteering, archetypes, dream guests, natural wine, DJ golden years, fundamental cooking tips, turning 40, coffee enemas and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
